forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the darkness of early morning envelops Downtown San Francisco, a soft and muted haze blankets the horizon, typical of this coastal city. The forecast hints at a day where clouds will linger, bringing a chill that draws close to the skin, with a gentle wind whispering at a modest pace. The temperatures are set to rise slightly throughout the day, yet the mildness is deceptive, as the clouds will quickly retreat to make way for the late afternoon coolness, much like the ebb and flow of the tides, leaving the air crisp against the lingering night.

The marine layer, a familiar shroud here, will cling to the edges of the Golden Gate Bridge, basking in its usual mystical allure as it weaves in and out of the skyline. One might find solace in a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, perhaps savoring a cup of freshly brewed coffee as the world begins to stir. As the sun makes its subtle play, throwing soft light through the clouds, dress in layers for comfort—a light jacket or sweater would be wise as you wander. Engage gently with the day—explore the lesser-known nooks of the city or indulge in a quiet moment among the artistry of the local cafes.
